data.name: My Example Source
data.subtitle: A source for all of my apps
data.description: Welcome to my source! Here you'll find all of my apps.

versions.localizedDescription:
Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements!
A new hotfix has been released to address issues discovered in the latest update, focusing on refining the Mounts of Mayhem gameplay experience.
Key fixes include:
General
Preventing the "Adventuring Time" achievement from unlocking early on PC.
Mounts of Mayhem (Spear Improvements)
Increasing the duration for Spear knockback during charging.
Improving the alignment of charge attack animations with Spear gameplay phases.
Marketplace & Technical Updates
Resolving an issue where the Escape key wouldn't return to the main menu after searching the Marketplace.
Fixing a 'Block' error code that could occur during level load or world creation with multiple add-ons.
Correcting incorrect UI textures on Switch when loading add-ons or connecting to servers.

privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: When you use the Xbox Live Friend Finder, it will access your contacts to help you find your friends.
privacy.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: Minecraft wants to access your local network. This allows you and others on your local network to play together. Declining this permission does not affect online features or gameplay. But will prevent you and others, on the same network, from playing together.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Used to read and write Minecraft images.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Used to read and write Minecraft images.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: Your data will be used to track advertising efficiency.
